name: MiS-FiTS 2
description:
Murphy, a dragon living in the middle of a desert, comes across a flower one day on the way to town. From there, an adventure unfolds, pushing the normally anxious Murphy way out of his comfort zone.

This is a sequel to my first game, MiS-FiTS! It's only a demo now, but I'm still working hard on it!

Background done by @red-sprite-lightning on tumblr! (she's also just been a huge help in the development of this in general so huge shoutouts to her, she's awesome)
